reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Reduce avoidable morbidity and mortality in oPT by strengthening the emergency care system

description.narrative: La presente iniziativa intende sostenere un intervento nella striscia di Gaza ed in aree pilota di West Bank al fine di strutturare, rafforzare e standardizzare i servizi essenziali di emergenza-urgenza, per fare fronte ad una situazione che è andata via via esacerbandosi, portando al collasso le strutture esistenti e offrendo ai pazienti un servizio insufficiente sia in termini quantitativi che qualitativi. L’intervento si occuperà inoltre del rafforzamento della preparedness delle comunità vulnerabili, fornendo loro capacità per fare fronte ad eventuali calamità, disastri o epidemie

This initiative intends to support an intervention in Gaza Strip and in pilot areas of West Bank in order to structure, strengthen and standardize essential emergency-urgency services, to cope with a situation that has been gradually exacerbating, leading to the collapse of existing structures and offering patients an insufficient service both in quantitative and qualitative terms. The intervention will also focus on the preparedness strengthening of the fragile communities, empowering them with increasing capacity to cope with any future hazard or outbreak.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all

By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to at least as low as 12 per 1,000 live births and under-5 mortality to at least as low as 25 per 1,000 live births
By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
